participant_1.background: i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i own a cat and a dog.

content.text: Mean girls is a great movie isn't it?
